com.almasb.fxgl.scene

Class GameScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLScene
      • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.GameScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.almasb.ents.ComponentListener, com.almasb.ents.ControlListener, com.almasb.ents.EntityWorldListener

    public final class GameScene
extends FXGLScene
implements com.almasb.ents.EntityWorldListener, com.almasb.ents.ComponentListener, com.almasb.ents.ControlListener
    Represents the scene that shows game objects on the screen during "play" mode. Contains 3 layers. From bottom to top:
    1. Entities and their render layers
    2. Particles
    3. UI Overlay
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • getGraphicsContext

        public javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext getGraphicsContext()
        Returns graphics context of the game scene. The render layer is over all entities. Use this only if performance is required. The drawing on this context can be done in GameApplication.onUpdate(double).
        Returns:
        graphics context
